thread.title: Report: Lamar Odom Suffering Numerous Strokes at Hospital
thread.title_full: Report: Lamar Odom Suffering Numerous Strokes at Hospital

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Report: Lamar Odom Suffering Numerous Strokes at Hospital
text:
Comments Khloe Kardashian's husband reportedly suffered strokes that affected his ability to walk and talk. 
New details of Lamar Odom 's Las Vegas hospitalization have emerged. According to TMZ, the NBA player suffered a dozen strokes during his stay at Sunrise Hospital in Nevada. While they didn't affect his vital organs, they did impact his motor skills. Lamar Odom was hospitalized in Las Vegas after found unconscious at a brothel. He has since been transferred to Los Angeles. Khloe Kardashian has been staying by his side since he was in coma. The couple recently called off their divorce. Rumor has it, the basketball player recently underwent emergency surgeries. The " Keeping Up with the Kardashians " star skipped Kim Kardashian 's birthday party and cancelled her book press tour to continue caring for her husband. "The past week has been incredibly difficult," she said in a statement. "You can never be prepared for an experience like this, but without the outpouring of love and endless prayers that Lamar has received and the strength I was given from my loved ones, it would have been difficult to endure. Thank you for your continued support."
